item.title: 'runstats' R package: Fast Computation of Running Statistics for Time Series
item.description: Package runstats provides methods for fast computation of running sample statistics for time series. The methods utilize Convolution Theorem to compute convolutions via Fast Fourier Transform (FFT). Implemented running statistics include: mean, standard deviation, variance, covariance, correlation, euclidean distance. Table of Contents Website Installation Usage Running statistics Performance Compare RunningCov {runstats} with a conventional method Compare RunningCov {runstats} with sliding_cov {dvmisc} c++ implementation Platform and system information Website Package website is located here.
